I like the game. It's fun but you should really get some friends to join you because playing this game with randoms can be super toxic. It's a good game at its core but at the same time, you'll probably need to get some friends.

Its a complex toxic yet amazing community of shit and god tier players all at once it isnt welcoming but doesnt push you awat either the feeling of getting 3 kills in your first game sucks yeah but the rounds you got those kills were the best feeling ever so when you play your second third and fourth game it just gets more fun

I have been playing this game for a while now, and it has been great! I have gotten really good at this game. I try and tell my friends at school how good i am. But they don't believe me. So i loaded my dad's ak47 and tried to take it to school. But my mom being the negative nancy that she is, would not let me take my dad's ak47 to school. So that caused me to get made fun of for my lack of skill in counter strike. So i snuck my dad's ak to school, made a list of people i wanted to show how good i was at counter strike. I was in the middle of spanish when i whipped the ak out and started bussin' heads. The school went into lockdown mode when i started to get nervous and thought i should just stop. But i learned from Ibuypower that i should never throw a match, so i went on with showing my counter strike skills. I went out of spanish with a 5k. Looks like the other team is on eco, haha. Unfortunately, i had to abandom the match because the swat team came and i got a lifetime cooldown with no parole. Atleast i was nicknamed screaM, and i really showed them who was the better counter strike player!
Just got it, it's fun I guess

all in all- its a pretty good game ig
